trans-unit.source: Exposes a stream around an anonymous pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: Viser en dataflyt rundt en anonym datakanalen som støtter både synkrone og asynkrone lese og skrive operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes help provide safe and secure interprocess communication between child and parent processes.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler bidra til å angi trygt og sikre interprosesskommunikasjon mellom underordnet og overordnet prosesser.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousPipeServerStream class enables a parent process to send or receive information from a child process.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AnonymousPipeServerStream aktiverer en overordnede prosessen for å sende eller motta informasjon fra en underordnet prosess.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes are unnamed, one-way pipes that typically transfer data between parent and child processes.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler er uten navn, enveis datakanaler som vanligvis overfører data mellom overordnede og underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes are always local; they cannot be used over a network.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler er alltid lokale. de kan ikke brukes i et nettverk.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes do not support <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> read modes.
trans-unit.target: Støtter ikke anonyme datakanaler <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>lese modi.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: The client side of an anonymous pipe must be created from a pipe handle provided by the server side by calling the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.GetClientHandleAsString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Klientsiden av en anonym datakanalen må opprettes fra en datakanalen referansen fra serversiden ved å kalle den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.GetClientHandleAsString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.GetClientHandleAsString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string is then passed as a parameter when creating the client process.
trans-unit.target: Strengen er deretter sendes som en parameter når du oppretter klientprosessen.

trans-unit.source: From the client process, it is then passed to the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream> constructor as the `pipeHandleAsString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Fra klientprosessen den deretter sendes til den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream>konstruktør som den `pipeHandleAsString` parameteren.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousPipeServerStream object must dispose the client handle using the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A> method in order to be notified when the client exits.
trans-unit.target: AnonymousPipeServerStream-objektet må fjerne referansen klienten bruker den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>metode for å bli varslet når klienten avslutter.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], maksimalt 10 datakanaler kan koble seg over nettverket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> constructors without a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> parameter, the default direction is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>konstruktører uten en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>parameteren Standardretning er <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object that has the default buffer size, no pipe security, and a <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter et <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objekt som har standardstørrelsen på bufferen, ingen datakanalen sikkerhet og <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>verdien for <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe direction.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse datakanalen retning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object that has the default buffer size, no pipe security, and a <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter et <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objekt som har standardstørrelsen på bufferen, ingen datakanalen sikkerhet og <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>verdien for <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes can only be in one direction, so `direction` cannot be set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler kan bare ha én retning så `direction` kan ikke settes til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: direction is set to .
trans-unit.target: directionis set to .

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse datakanalen retningen og inheritability modus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object that has the default buffer size and no pipe security.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objektet som har standardstørrelsen på bufferen og ingen datakanalen sikkerhet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes can only be in one direction, so `direction` cannot be set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler kan bare ha én retning så `direction` kan ikke settes til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle can be inherited by child processes.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer om den underliggende referansen arves av underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: Must be set to either <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> or <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: Må være satt til enten <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>eller <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: inheritability is not set to either or .
trans-unit.target: inheritabilityer ikke satt til enten eller .

trans-unit.target: directionis set to .

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klassen fra datakanalen håndtakene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes can only be in one direction, so `direction` cannot be set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler kan bare ha én retning så `direction` kan ikke settes til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A safe handle for the pipe that this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: En safe håndtere for datakanalen som denne <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet vil omfatter.

trans-unit.source: A safe handle for the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Sikre referansen for den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: serverSafePipeHandle or clientSafePipeHandle is an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: serverSafePipeHandleeller clientSafePipeHandle er en ugyldig referanse.

trans-unit.source: serverSafePipeHandle or clientSafePipeHandle is .
trans-unit.target: serverSafePipeHandleor clientSafePipeHandle is .

trans-unit.source: direction is set to .
trans-unit.target: directionis set to .

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as a disk error, has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en i/u-feil, for eksempel en diskfeil.

trans-unit.source: -or- The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe direction, inheritability mode, and buffer size.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse datakanalen retningen, inheritability modus og bufferstørrelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object without pipe security.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objektet uten datakanalen sikkerhet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes can only be in one direction, so `direction` cannot be set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler kan bare ha én retning så `direction` kan ikke settes til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle can be inherited by child processes.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer om den underliggende referansen arves av underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: Must be set to either <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> or <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: Må være satt til enten <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>eller <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: The size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på bufferen.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien må være større enn eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: inheritability is not set to either or .
trans-unit.target: inheritabilityer ikke satt til enten eller .

trans-unit.source: -or- bufferSize is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - bufferSize er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: direction is set to .
trans-unit.target: directionis set to .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe direction, inheritability mode, buffer size, and pipe security.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse datakanalen retningen, inheritability modus, bufferstørrelsen og datakanalen sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>verdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>støttes ikke fordi anonym datakanaler defineres for å være enveis.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes can only be in one direction, so `direction` cannot be set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anonym datakanaler kan bare ha én retning så `direction` kan ikke settes til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle can be inherited by child processes.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer om den underliggende referansen arves av underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: The size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på bufferen.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien må være større enn eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: An object that determines the access control and audit security for the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som bestemmer tilgangskontroll og overvåking sikkerhet for datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: inheritability is not set to either or .
trans-unit.target: inheritabilityer ikke satt til enten eller .

trans-unit.source: -or- bufferSize is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - bufferSize er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: direction is set to .
trans-unit.target: directionis set to .

trans-unit.source: Gets the safe handle for the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object that is currently connected to the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den sikre referansen for den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objekt som er koblet til den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A> method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>metoden må kalles når en klient-referansen som ble sendt til en klientprosess.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden ikke kalles, den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objektet vil ikke motta varsel når klienten disposes av den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: A handle for the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object that is currently connected to the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Referansen for den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objekt som er koblet til den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Closes the local copy of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object's handle.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det lokale eksemplaret av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objektets referansen.

trans-unit.source: The DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle method should be called after the client handle has been passed to the client.
trans-unit.target: DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle-metoden må kalles når klienten-referansen som ble sendt til klienten.

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden ikke kalles, den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objektet vil ikke motta varsel når klienten disposes av den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> forekomsten gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connected <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object's handle as a string.
trans-unit.target: Henter den tilkoblede <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objektets referansen som en streng.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A> method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>metoden må kalles når en klient-referansen som ble sendt til en klientprosess.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream.DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream> object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden ikke kalles, den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>objektet vil ikke motta varsel når klienten disposes av den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the connected <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"></xref> object's handle.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer den tilkoblede <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeClientStream"> </xref> objektets referansen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the reading mode for the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Angir lesemodus for den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: For anonymous pipes, transmission mode must be <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overføringsmodus må være for anonym datakanaler <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes do not support <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> read mode.
trans-unit.target: Støtter ikke anonyme datakanaler <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>lesemodus.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: The reading mode for the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lesemodus for den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The transmission mode is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Overføringsmodus er ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: For anonymous pipes, only <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"></xref> is supported.
trans-unit.target: For anonym datakanaler, bare <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"> </xref> støttes.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"></xref>, which is not supported for anonymous pipes.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"> </xref>, som ikke støttes for anonym datakanaler.

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken or another I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen er brutt eller en annen i/u-feil oppstår.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the pipe transmission mode that is supported by the current pipe.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakanalen overføringsmodus som støttes av gjeldende datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous pipes do not support <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> read mode.
trans-unit.target: Støtter ikke anonyme datakanaler <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>lesemodus.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"></xref> that is supported by the current pipe.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode"> </xref> som støttes av gjeldende datakanalen.
